author: Mark
message: Someone is having problem with KDE 4.0: http://www.salatti.net/kde-...

author: Aurélien
message: @Mark: reporting KDE4 bugs here is not the more efficient way to get them fixed. You would have better luck posting a bug on bugs.kde.org (or check it has not already been reported).

author: Peter Penz
message:
I did not try out Gwenview during the development of KDE 4.0 and just had a look on it the last 2 days - I really love it! Thanks Aurélien for such a great application :-)

Peter

author: Aurélien
message: @Peter Penz: glad you like it, thanks for Dolphin!

author: vasanth
message: i tried Gwenview 4.0 RC2 and in KDE 4. Gwenview is reallly nice. Keep up the good work..

author: Abe E
message: wow, what an improvement. My only critique is the Open With External Tools menu is missing. That needs to be put back in pronto.

author: Abe E
message: Sorry, I didn't know until soon after I started using kde4 that really wasn't reay fi the end user as yet, whhich would explain the ommision of the external tools option on the right click menu. I will be patient now :) Also, one thing I noticed was missing was it doesn't tell you how many files are in a specific folder and what picture you are on, ie 15 of 100. I know when it's ready it will be in there. Just something else I noticed missing. Great job on the program so far.
